00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief Terminator for not handled WISHBONE bus cycles.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief bus_terminator.v
00030 */
00031 module bus_terminator(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input CLK_I,
00035     input reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00039     //% @{
00040     input [31:2]    ADR_I,
00041     input           CYC_I,
00042     input           WE_I,
00043     input           STB_I,
00044     input [3:0]     SEL_I,
00045     input [31:0]    slave_DAT_I,
00046     output [31:0]   slave_DAT_O,
00047     output reg      ACK_O,
00048     output reg      RTY_O,
00049     output          ERR_O,
00050     //% @}
00051     
00052     //% \name ao68000 interrupt cycle indicator

00053     //% @{
00054     input           cpu_space_cycle
00055     //% @}
00056 );
00057 
00058 assign ERR_O        = 1'b0;
00059 assign slave_DAT_O  = 32'd0;
00060 
00061 wire accepted_addresses =
00062     ({ADR_I, 2'b00} >= 32'h00F00000 && {ADR_I, 2'b00} <= 32'h00F7FFFC) ||
00063     ({ADR_I, 2'b00} >= 32'h00E80000 && {ADR_I, 2'b00} <= 32'h00EFFFFC) ||
00064     // Lotus2
00065     ({ADR_I, 2'b00} >= 32'h00200000 && {ADR_I, 2'b00} <= 32'h009FFFFF) ||
00066     // Pinball Dreams
00067     {ADR_I, 2'b00} == 32'h00DFF11C ||
00068     
00069     {ADR_I, 2'b00} == 32'h00DFF1FC ||
00070     {ADR_I, 2'b00} == 32'h00DFF0FC ||
00071     {ADR_I, 2'b00} == 32'h00DC003C ||
00072     {ADR_I, 2'b00} == 32'h00D8003C ||
00073     {ADR_I, 2'b00} == 32'hFFFFFFFC;
00074 
00075 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00076     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00077         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00078         RTY_O <= 1'b0;
00079     end
00080     else begin
00081         if( cpu_space_cycle == 1'b0 &&
00082             accepted_addresses == 1'b1 &&
00083             CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && ACK_O == 1'b0)    ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00084         else                                                    ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00085         
00086         if( cpu_space_cycle == 1'b1 && 
00087             ADR_I[31:5] == 27'b111_1111_1111_1111_1111_1111_1111 &&
00088             CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b0)
00089         begin
00090             RTY_O <= 1'b1;
00091         end
00092         else begin
00093             RTY_O <= 1'b0;
00094         end
00095     end
00096 end
00097 
00098 endmodule
Generated on Mon Dec 20 2010 21:20:18 for aoOCS by  1.7.2
